# Interface MetricConfigInterface

Configuration for a metric

#### Description

Defines the properties required to configure a telemetry metric

interface MetricConfigInterface {  
description?: string;  
metricType: [MetricType](/enums/telemetry.MetricType);  
name: string;  
unit?: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

description? metricType name unit?

## Properties

### `Optional`description

description?: string

Human-readable description of what the metric measures

#### Optional

### metricType

metricType: [MetricType](/enums/telemetry.MetricType)

The type of metric to configure

### name

name: string

The unique name identifier for the metric

#### Description

Used to identify and query the metric in telemetry systems

### `Optional`unit

unit?: string

Unit of measurement for the metric values

#### Optional

#### Example


```
"bytes", "seconds", "requests", "percentage"

```


### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
